lines.speaker: Narrator
lines.text: Experience the ultimate rush. Play now.

scenes.visual_prompt: Close-up, low angle of a race car's slick tire ready on the asphalt, with soft morning light. A sense of powerful anticipation.
Medium close-up of a driver's gloved hands intensely gripping a carbon-fiber steering wheel, dynamic interior lighting. Pure focus.
Wide shot, ground level, a sleek futuristic race car blurs past at incredible speed on a sun-drenched track. Raw velocity.
First-person POV from the cockpit, the track ahead a blur of speed and vibrant golden hour light. Intense, immersive action.
Wide shot, a victorious race car crosses the finish line, dramatic low angle, cinematic twilight and a flash of celebratory light. A moment of triumph.
scenes.audio_prompt: Roaring crowd cheer builds, triumphant sounder
scenes.motion_prompt: Slow zoom out to reveal logo
